paper_title.ja: 高齢者生活福祉センターへの生活拠点移動の要因とプロセス
paper_title.en: A STUDY ON THE CAUSES AND PROCESS OF RELOCATION TO THE DAY LIVING AND HOUSING SERVICE CENTER FOR THE ELDERLY

description.ja: In this study, the causes and process of relocation are taken into consideration, the 108 households living in the day living and housing service center for the elderly in the depopulated area being interviewed. The causes of relocation seem to be potential causes that consist in care problems and housing problems in previous living life, and direct causes, close relation is seen between them. Information of facilities introduced by community welfare volunteer or from government offices in the town is more than half of all. Period of considering relocation to facility in many cases is very short, within 2 weeks. Some cases that relocation to facility is not decided by themselves, but their family members are seen (14 households). The longer their living time in their previous houses becomes, the stronger psychological burden in relocation becomes. And the case of relocation from owner occupied houses, it becomes the same. Now about treatment of houses in relocation, About 80 percent (56 households) of the households with owner occupied houses still own their houses now; There are houses left vacant (40 households), dwelled by their family members (16 households). Or in the cases when they intend to dispose of their owner occupied houses (13 households) or rental houses (15 households), they hope to live long or forever there in facility, but present facilities are founded as a short term residential supply.
description.en: In this study, the causes and process of relocation are taken into consideration, the 108 households living in the day living and housing service center for the elderly in the depopulated area being interviewed. The causes of relocation seem to be potential causes that consist in care problems and housing problems in previous living life, and direct causes, close relation is seen between them. Information of facilities introduced by community welfare volunteer or from government offices in the town is more than half of all. Period of considering relocation to facility in many cases is very short, within 2 weeks. Some cases that relocation to facility is not decided by themselves, but their family members are seen (14 households). The longer their living time in their previous houses becomes, the stronger psychological burden in relocation becomes. And the case of relocation from owner occupied houses, it becomes the same. Now about treatment of houses in relocation, About 80 percent (56 households) of the households with owner occupied houses still own their houses now; There are houses left vacant (40 households), dwelled by their family members (16 households). Or in the cases when they intend to dispose of their owner occupied houses (13 households) or rental houses (15 households), they hope to live long or forever there in facility, but present facilities are founded as a short term residential supply.

paper_title.ja: 知的障害者福祉就労施設の類型化と特性把握(大分県の場合)知的障害者施設整備の適正化に関する研究その1
paper_title.en: CLASSIFICATION AND CLARIFICATION OF CHARACTERISTICS ON THE WELFARE WORKING FACILITIES FOR INTELLECTUAL DISABLED PERSON (IN THE CASE OF OITA PREF.) : A study on the rationalization of arrangement for the facilities for intellectual disabled person Part 1

description.ja: For stimulation on participation in society and getting the useful data of intellectual disabled person, we clarified the characteristics and classified on 3 kinds of welfare working facilities (cooperating work-shop, industrial training facilities, welfare factory). Classifications were able to grasp 5 points of view, as follows, located condition, the utility circle of commuters, the ratio of disabled ranks, indication of changing treatment, the stance of parents for rehabilitation. According to the classification, there are remarkable difference on each aspect. Located condition prescribes the utility circle, accessibility make opportunity to commute by them selves. The tendency of disabled seriously, high aged, remaining with facilities for a long time brings about troublesome condition for working. And made reference the characteristics of each kind of facilities.
description.en: For stimulation on participation in society and getting the useful data of intellectual disabled person, we clarified the characteristics and classified on 3 kinds of welfare working facilities (cooperating work-shop, industrial training facilities, welfare factory). According to the classification, there are remarkable difference on each aspect. Located condition prescribes the utility circle, accessibility make opportunity to commute by them selves. The tendency of disabled seriously, high aged, remaining with facilities for a long time brings about troublesome condition for working. And made reference the characteristics of each kind of facilities.
